title: Black Mountain - In the Future Deluxe Edition - slavetothesound
description:
Just found out this morning that Demonoid is back online! What better way to celebrate than to upload some good lossless music for you fellow audio junkies out there? Black Mountain&#039;s In the Future is a great rock album with influences from tons of other genre&#039;s and mp3s really don&#039;t do it justice. So kick back and give it a listen in FLAC.  Put it on a CD and play it on your nice home stereos.  It&#039;s not worth the larger download to play this through laptop speakers, so if that&#039;s your plan then save the bandwidth for someone who will really appreciate this.

Also, this is the deluxe edition of the album which came with a bonus CD and only 10,000 were produced. Here is the track list:

CD 1:
01. Stormy High    [0:04:33.53]
02. Angels    [0:03:07.58]
03. Tyrants    [0:08:02.50]
04. Wucan    [0:06:02.72]
05. Stay Free    [0:04:29.70]
06. Queens Will Play    [0:05:16.56]
07. Evil Ways    [0:03:26.12]
08. Wild Wind    [0:01:42.38]
09. Bright Lights    [0:16:41.21]
10. Night Walks    [0:03:56.43]

CD 2:
01. Bastards of Light    [0:05:09.27]
02. Thirteen Walls    [0:07:06.54]
03. Black Cat    [0:02:51.28]

Ripped with EAC 0.99 (log files included) and checked with AccurateRip.

If you have any suggestions for future releases, leave them here in th e comments.  I am new to uploading lossless torrents so let me know if I should do something differently.

I really love this band and think that everyone should support them and buy a CD if you really like it, but I want everyone to hear it, too.  Support Black Mountain and see a show if they come to your area at least.

Watch for more...

 - slavetothesound
